INDEX.HERO_DESCRIPTION: Creative and enthusiastic web developer & designer with a focus on practical interfaces and web tools.
INDEX.SEO_DESCRIPTION: Creative and enthusiastic web developer and designer, focused on practical interfaces and web tools.
INDEX.ABOUT_DESCRIPTION: My name is Gregory, and I'm a 24-year-old working student.
INDEX.ABOUT_DESCRIPTION2: My passion for technology began at a young age, It has been fueled by a continuous desire to learn through creation, making servers, building computers and developing practical ideas. Each project serves as an opportunity to learn and refine my skills.
INDEX.ABOUT_DESCRIPTION3: Currently, my goal is to enter into the IT industry and deepen my expertise in a specialized area to become a more proficient and impactful developer.

PROJECTS.FINCAS_BARAHONA: Rental of tourist accommodations in the seaside city of Altea with file and receipt management using Nextcloud.
PROJECTS.DEVICE_ORIENTATION: A webpage without framework demonstrating parallax effects using Device Orientation and mouse hover interactions.
PROJECTS.PAU_PORTFOLIO: A personal portfolio webpage, showcasing her work and skills.
PROJECTS.ECOMMERCE_ON_ASTRO: Is a work in progress ecommerce webpage using Astro and Shopify API.
